author: Staff report
title: Greetings From: The Mediterranean
text: Posted Sep. 27, 2015 at 8:21 AM By Staff report Posted Sep. 27, 2015 at 8:21 AM Holland, Mich. Bill and Barb Wiersma returned to Holland from a 14-night Mediterranean cruise, from Istanbul, Turkey, to Barcelona, Spain. They visited 7 countries, 11 ports of call, including Ephesus, Athens, Rome, Vatican, Florence, Kotor, Villefranche. They called it an "Amazing trip to see what civilization could build 2,500 years ago, Biblical cities, and the beauty of Europe." Send us your travel photos Send your scenic travel photo to lori.timmer@hollandsentinel.com or 54 W. Eighth St., Holland, MI 49423. Include information about your trip, as well as a contact number. By Staff report
